description: Numbers that are congruent to {1, 2, 6} mod 8.
comments: n such that the determinant of the character table of the cyclic group C_n is an integer (for every n this determinant has degree at most 2 over the rationals Q ). - Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Jul 16 2001
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
